backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing user profile storage, slot settings, pricing rules, and blocked-slot management with admin authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented frontend features to source files, components, and requirement IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, booking, admin tools, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color variables, themes, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entry with favicon, title, root container, and script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring routing, themes, and global providers for the booking and admin interfaces.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin calendar showing daily slot availability, booked and blocked slots, with date selection and refresh controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/BlockSlots: Provides a dialog to block or unblock a time slot with optional reason input and async mutation handlers.
frontend/src/components/admin/EarningsTr: Displays daily and weekly earnings based on a selected date using earnings query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingRul: Shows and updates pricing rules for weekdays and weekends with form validation and mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/SlotSettin: Form for configuring opening hours and slot duration with validation and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessRestr: Shows an access restricted message and a button to return to the booking page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Gatekeeper component enforcing login, profile completion, and admin status before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/customer/Availab: Displays available hourly slots with formatted time and price, allowing users to select a slot.
frontend/src/components/customer/Booking: Handles booking creation with user details, authentication flow, and form submission to create a booking.
Shows a summary card of the selected date, time, sport, and total price before booking completion.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and route outlet, adapting UI for customer or admin routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, identity loading, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend API interactions in React Query hooks for profiles, settings, pricing, blocked slots, bookings, and admin checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom dark-theme variables and utility layers for the application's visual design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App into the root element.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides an admin dashboard with tabs for calendar management, slot settings, pricing rules, and earnings tracking.
frontend/src/pages/customer/BookingConfi: Displays confirmation details for a specific booking, including date, time, and status, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerBook: Allows customers to select a date, view available slots, calculate pricing, and proceed with booking through a form.
frontend/src/pages/customer/PaymentPlace: Shows a placeholder payment page with upcoming payment method info and routes users to booking confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/customer/ReceiptLooku: Provides a form for users to enter a booking ID and navigate to its confirmation page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for extracting, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL parameters, with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines project state for a full‑stack turf‑booking app, including architecture notes, image requirements, and a list of existing admin and customer features. Contains metadata like schema version, project state version, and planned functionality for scheduling, pricing, and access control.
